metadata.title: Mariell Gold Cubic Zirconia Clip-On Earrings, Pear Shape CZ Crystal, 2 Carat Imitation Diamond Earring
features: Two Ct. Cubic Zirconia Pear Shaped Clip-On Earrings with Comfort Pad Clip Backs; Each Solitaire Clip measures 2 Carats
Plated in Genuine 14 Karat Gold for the Rich Look of Fine Jewelry; Each Clip Stud Measures 3/8" high x 1/4" w
Top Quality Cubic Zirconia; Precision-Cut Facets for the Brilliance of Genuine Diamonds
Designed, Manufactured and Packaged by Mariell, a USA-Based Woman Owned Company
Beautifully Packaged in Luxurious Embossed Mariell Designs Black Kraft Gift Box
description: The brilliant look of fiery Genuine diamonds is yours wearing these 2 Carat CZ solitaire pear-shaped clip-on stud earrings. Though delicate in size, these lightweight dazzlers pack endless sparkle - thanks to quality Cubic Zirconia and Genuine 14Kt Gold plating. We can't resist the dress-up or dress-down versatility of these clip earrings for both formal and everyday wear. Good things do indeed come in small packages! Add subtle sparkle to your wedding, prom, bridesmaids or special event and enjoy these classic pear-shaped clip studs for business or casual wear as well. Best of all, no one but you will know these gleaming 14 Karat Yellow Gold plated Zirconium beauties are not real diamonds! Treat yourself or someone you love to sophisticated glamour. Who needs diamonds when you've got the look of priceless jewels at a fraction of the cost. Finally, you can have non-pierced earrings with delicate styling and a sophisticated dose of bling. These glistening teardrop-shaped studs are a must-have addition to every jewelry wardrobe. 3-Pronged set studs Measures 3/8" high x 1/4" with comfortable cushion-back pads for day-into nigh enjoyment. We promise you'll love these best-selling CZ earring clips. "Diamonds are a girl's best friend" and there's no better gift than these gorgeous simulated diamond clip-ons.
